title: DailyDoseCode #004 — One File Runs My Entire Blog
summary: I built a blog where one JSON file controls publishing, layout, and updates.
content: Today I stopped editing HTML and started building systems. By writing a single entry in a JSON file, my homepage, blog archive, and individual post pages update automatically. This is the shift from building pages to building workflows—and it changes everything.
